Name: TC_CHECKOUT_001
Precondition:
-User has a valid and active account
-User logged in
-User added a product to cart
-Cart page is opened
Objective: Verify that the user can complete checkout with valid cart items
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify that at least one product is displayed on the cart page
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The selected product is visible in the cart with correct details
User is navigated to the checkout information page

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify that the checkout information page is displayed
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Checkout page is displayed successfully and ready for user input

Name: TC_CHECKOUT_002
Precondition:
-User has a valid and active account
-User logged in
-User added a product to cart
-Checkout information page is opened
Objective: Verify that user can continue with valid checkout information
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
First name field accepts the entered value without displaying any 
validation error

Last name field accepts the entered value without displaying any validation 
error

Zipcode field accepts the entered value without displaying any validation 
error
User is navigated to the checkout overview page successfully

Name: TC_CHECKOUT_003
Precondition:
-User has a valid and active account
-User logged in
-User added a product to cart
-Checkout overview page is opened
Objective:
Verify that the user can complete checkout successfully from the checkout 
overview page
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify that all displayed checkout information matches the entered inputs
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: All checkout details match the previously entered information
Order confirmation page is displayed successfully
